_header: With sorrowful sighs and grevious pain
Note:
Cf. 6747. See Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler TM 2009.
_description: The lovers’ next meeting — one quatrain

BLAdd31922.Transcription: With sorowfull syghs and greuos payneThus euer to endureAlas pour hart tyl that we mete agayneIoy shall I neuer ye may be sure
BLAdd31922.Note: Words and notes repeated twice for further singing parts.
